search.query: | inputlookup lookup_host_site.csv | stats count by SiteName

`xd_index` SiteName="$SiteName$" sourcetype="xendesktop:*:machine" | table host AgentVersion CatalogName DesktopGroupName PersistUserChanges PowerState RegistrationState | dedup host | sort host | rename host AS Machine AgentVersion AS "Agent Version" CatalogName AS "Machine Catalog" DesktopGroupName AS "Delivery Group" PersistUserChanges AS "Persist User Changes" PowerState AS "Power State" RegistrationState AS "Registration State"

| inputlookup lookup_pubapp.csv | join type=outer BrowserName SiteName [search `xd_index` SiteName="$SiteName$" sourcetype=xendesktop:*:session | makemv delim=";" ApplicationsInUse | stats dc(UserName) AS "User Count" BY ApplicationsInUse SiteName | rename ApplicationsInUse AS BrowserName] | search SiteName="$SiteName$" | fillnull value="0" "User Count" | sort - "User Count" | table SiteName PublishedName ApplicationType Status "User Count" BrowserName | rename SiteName AS "Site" PublisehdName AS "Application" ApplicationType AS "Application Type"
